#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
=Download=
Firstly, you should download the zip package, an put it into any dir.

=Install=
{{{
$ zip blade-1.0.zip
$ cd blade
$ ./install
}}}
The installing program linked the binary to the ones in the unzipped dir, so don't remove the unzipped dir.

Blade will be installed to ~/bin, if it' not in your PATH environment, relogin maybe required.

=Experience=
Then, you can experience blade by example
{{{
$ cd example
$ blade build ...
$ blade test...
$ blade clean ...
$ blade run app:app
$ blade 
}}}

=Build your code=
Organize you code same as example, you can enjoy blade now.
